sensorthings.components.featuresofinterest package

Submodules

sensorthings.components.featuresofinterest.engine module

class sensorthings.components.featuresofinterest.engine.FeatureOfInterestBaseEngine

Bases: object

Abstract base class for handling Features of Interest.

This class defines the required methods for managing features of interest. These methods must be implemented to allow the SensorThings API to interface with an underlying database.

abstract create_feature_of_interest(feature_of_interest)

Create a new feature of interest.

Parameters:

feature_of_interest (Any) – The feature of interest object to create.

Returns:

The ID of the newly created feature of interest.

Return type:

str

abstract delete_feature_of_interest(feature_of_interest_id)

Delete an existing feature of interest.

Parameters:

feature_of_interest_id (str) – The ID of the feature of interest to delete.

Return type:

None

abstract get_features_of_interest(feature_of_interest_ids=None, observation_ids=None, pagination=None, ordering=None, filters=None, expanded=False)

Retrieve features of interest based on the given criteria.

Parameters:

  • feature_of_interest_ids (List[str], optional) – List of feature of interest IDs to filter by.

  • observation_ids (List[str], optional) – List of observation IDs to filter by.

  • pagination (dict, optional) – Pagination options.

  • ordering (dict, optional) – Ordering options.

  • filters (dict, optional) – Additional filtering options.

  • expanded (bool, optional) – Whether to include expanded related entities.

Returns:

A tuple containing a dictionary of features of interest and the total count.

Return type:

tuple

abstract update_feature_of_interest(feature_of_interest_id, feature_of_interest)

Update an existing feature of interest.

Parameters:

  • feature_of_interest_id (str) – The ID of the feature of interest to update.

  • feature_of_interest (Any) – The updated feature of interest object.

Return type:

None

sensorthings.components.featuresofinterest.schemas module

class sensorthings.components.featuresofinterest.schemas.FeatureOfInterest(**data)

Bases: BaseComponent, FeatureOfInterestFields, FeatureOfInterestRelations

A schema representing a feature of interest.

This class combines the fields and relations of a feature of interest, and extends the BaseComponent class.

class Config
